nodes.excerpt: This template is designed to help you keep track of your subscriptions, get reminders before the renewal date, see a timeline for your subscriptions, and convert the currency of any subscription to your desired currency.
nodes.title: Notion Ultimate Subscription System - You will never pay for a subscription you don't need again

nodes.excerpt: WidgetGrid is a new way to turn Google Spreadsheets into data-driven widgets on the home screen. You can start from templates to create widgets. You can edit your data in spreadsheets and customize the design of all kinds of widgets in WidgetGrid.
nodes.title: WidgetGrid - No-code platform for iOS widgets

nodes.excerpt: Soundrop is an app that allows you to create your own personalized sound track to keep you focused or relax. You can mix and match different sounds and share your unique musical recipe with others. Use Soundrop to create your perfect environment.
